body:
Do you have some kind of wrapper around rm?

I don't think the error message "unknown shorthand flag: 'f' in -f"
is emitted by rm and rm clearly supports -f as explained by the
help message.

You can try sh -x make.bash to find the offending command
invocation. it seems to be "rm -f
$GOROOT/pkg/tool/$GOOS_$GOARCH/go_bootstrap",
but I didn't see anything wrong with that command.
